name.ja: <ruby>起<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>動<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>指<rt>し</rt></ruby><ruby>令<rt>れい</rt></ruby> ギア・フォース

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while the only monsters on your field are face-up Level 4 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monsters.

effect.en: Destroy Attack Position Level 8 or lower monsters on your opponent's field, up to [the number of monsters on your field].
